title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 80.8 - Audit procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 80.8 - Audit procedures

State Regulations

Section
1698
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law authorizes the department to audit a sample of
records of a TNC for the purpose of verifying compliance with the licensing
requirements of the department. Such audits shall be conducted no more
frequently than on a quarterly basis, with at least 10 business days' notice to
the TNC, unless the department has grounds to believe that additional audits
are warranted. The TNC may exclude information on a record that would tend to
identify specific drivers or passengers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
80.8

Adopted

New

York State Register August 30, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 35, eff. 8/30/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
